summary: Claude is a ruthless and efficient contract killer - until he finds his next target is a woman.
cast: Vince Edwards|Phillip Pine|Herschel Bernardi|Caprice Toriel|Michael Granger|Kathie Browne|Joseph Mell|Frances Osborne|Steven Ritch|Janet Brandt|Davis Roberts|Don Garrett|Gloria Victor|Cisco Houston|William H. O'Brien
title: Asesinato por contrato
